name: Monster Onslaught
description:
Destroy monsters and reach the last wave in this classic top-down shooter!

- Left mouse button to fire regular shots

- Right mouse button to fire homing missiles

- Earn cash by killing enemies (Can't purchase anything quite yet)

- Press "f" near barricades to fix them

- Though it still says "Press 'r' to return to main menu" in the bottom-right corner of the play screen, you actually need to press "space bar" to pause the game then click the "Main Menu" button on-screen  (Will remove the faulty message in next update)

- There's a special wave of enemies after the first 2 :D (Currently only 3 waves)

** The waves are pre-defined by me in the script where the enemies spawn **

This is not a limitation, but a choice I made for ultimate control of each wave in the game
